Detailed Description

This helper class encapsulates the prerequisites of an entity instance.

Member Function Documentation

void PrerequisitesOrder::doBackgroundTask ( BgTaskManager &  mgr  )  [protected, virtual]

This method loads all the prerequisites described in the given order.

Note: This method runs in a loading thread, and thus may not modify the entity at all (not even its reference count)

Implements BackgroundTask.
